title: Splash-o-matic GCK-O
paragraphs: The Splash-o-matic GCK-O is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is a Barazushi-branded variant of the the Splash-o-matic.

The Splash-o-matic GCK-O is nearly identical in appearance to the Splash-o-matic. However, parts of the weapon that are colored dull bronze are now dark brown, and it has a lamp attached on top. The Barazushi logo can be seen of the side of the weapon.
The Splash-o-matic GCK-O makes its first appearance in Splatoon 3 as part of the Splatlands Collection. Its kit consists of Toxic Mist and Ink Storm.
- Promotional image of the Splatlands Collection - Barazushi weapons

The suffix "GCK-O" is a stylized spelling of the word gecko.
